stages.stageBody: You enter your cell and see a single bed with an iron frame, a small desk, and a toilet and sink at the other end of the cell. The small window above the bed has bars on them.
You see that there is a small dock with a small boat that isn't guarded. You know how you'll be able to get off the island since you've spent all your summers sailing
Looks really uncomfortable, you need to escape this place and return to your nice soft bed!

The guard enters the room and finds you writing your escape plan. It is confiscated and you're sent to solitary confinement…congrats you've set a new record for the fastest time for a new inmate to be sent to the hole and you fail your escape mission, start over!!
Well done, this is the correct option. Once you've moved onto the next stage you can't return.

You hear a commotion outside your cell and go to see what's going on, two inmates are fighting. You notice one of the inmates dropped something and it is very close to you. In the chaos, all the attention is on the fighting inmates

nextStage.btnText: Walk away, you've got exploring to do!

stages.stageBody: You see the item is a small pickaxe, this reminds you of that old movie you can't remember the name of! You put it in your pocket

The inmates are eventually pulled apart by the prison guards and are sent to solitary confinement. One guard yells at you to go back to your cell…maybe be careful calling attention to yourself in future
Have you never seen a prison movie?! Start again.

stages.stageTitle: Walk away, you've got exploring to do!
stages.stageBody: Well done, this is the correct option. Once you've moved onto the next stage you can't return.

You enter the dining hall and are hit by a revolting smell of whatever monstrosity the kitchen has cooked! You miss the smell of your mother's home cooking. You take a deep breath and go to get a tray of the slop they call food. You look around after getting your food and see three available seats

nextStage.btnText: Take a seat with the group of scary-looking men  who are all arm wrestling
Take a seat with the old man scowling at his dinner
Take a seat with the smaller man who is guarding his food
Take your food back to your cell…Your food is horrible and your desk chair doesn't have lumbar support, prison really is horrible

stages.stageTitle: ake a seat with the group of scary-looking men  who are all arm wrestling
stages.stageBody: You take a seat and the table goes silent…One of the men informs you that if you want to sit with them you have to beat one of them in arm wrestling (you can see these guys spend their time here working out). You get up and leave them to their arm wrestling!

stages.stageTitle: Take a seat with the old man scowling at his dinner
stages.stageBody: Thinking that the old prison inmate in all the movies holds all the knowledge you sit down and try to start a conversation… unfortunately, the old man is VERY deaf and you spend 10 minutes shouting at him trying to figure out his name…it's Alfred

stages.stageTitle: Take a seat with the smaller man who is guarding his food
stages.stageBody: The man looks at you suspiciously, bringing his food closer to him. After a while of talking, he seems to relax a bit and even invites you back to his cell sometime to have a peanut butter sandwich. He tells you that he can get you any food you want as he has a hookup in the kitchen

stages.stageTitle: Take your food back to your cell…Your food is horrible and your desk chair doesn't have lumbar support, prison really is horrible
stages.stageBody: Well done, this is the correct option. Once you've moved onto the next stage you can't return.
After lunch, you go to the exercise yard. You always hated PE in school so this really isn't the place for you

nextStage.btnText: Go and mingle with your fellow inmates
Go find something else to do

stages.stageTitle: Go and mingle with your fellow inmates
stages.stageBody: You awkwardly try to talk with a few of the inmates, gaining no useful information and an inferiority complex

You overhear the guards complaining about the lack of staff and training, and one of the guards were laughing about going through the wrong doors constantly and if the door isn't labelled they'd have no clue where it would go
Might as well work on your beach body, you are on an island after all!

stages.stageTitle: Go find something else to do!
stages.stageBody: Well done, this is the correct option. Once you've moved onto the next stage you can't return.

The library is surely the place to find the perfect escape plan! Unfortunately, the books they have are very limited, and of course, they don't have The Count of Monte Cristo (cause that would be too obvious, you should have read it when you had the chance!)

nextStage.btnText: Find a book and try to distract yourself until dinner
Try to listen in on the other people in the library
Ask the librarian for maps of the prison and island

stages.stageTitle: Find a book and try to distract yourself until dinner
stages.stageBody: You pick a book at random and see that it has a copy of popular mechanics hidden inside, with an article on how to make your own life preservers with raincoats and steam…for some reason you're getting a sense of deja vu

stages.stageTitle: Try to listen in on the other people in the library
stages.stageBody: Two of the inmates are laughing between themselves about the new security guard, apparently, the guard accidentally walked into the showers thinking it was the guard's room! Another group of inmates is complaining about an inmate who keeps stealing other people's stuff from their cell (you make a note to not keep anything useful in your cell)

stages.stageTitle: Ask the librarian for maps of the prison and island
stages.stageBody: Seriously? Did you think that would work? The Prison officer hears your request and writes you up for asking for inappropriate materials. He is tailing you now, start over
Well done, this is the correct option. Once you've moved onto the next stage you can't return.
You drop in on the small man from lunch and join him for a peanut sandwich

nextStage.btnText: Ask if he can get you a jar of peanut butter
Ask how he ended up in prison
Ask if he knows any escape stories

stages.stageTitle: Ask if he can get you a jar of peanut butter
stages.stageBody: Turns out he has a spare jar, and he gives you it as a welcome present…better than that plant your friend got you when you moved into your last apartment!

stages.stageTitle: Ask how he ended up in prison
stages.stageBody: He says he's innocent and the police framed him…you get the sense that he isn't telling you the truth

stages.stageTitle: Ask if he knows any escape stories
stages.stageBody: He tells you that the door next to the guard's breakroom leads outside, and if you can get out there you can make a run for it to the boats... problem is it's locked
Well done, this is the correct option. Once you've moved onto the next stage you can't return.

You walk back to your cell, it's getting late, and it's dark outside. You have your jar of peanut butter, a little pickaxe, a hacksaw, and some ripped bits of cloth. As you walk past the guard's breakroom you see the door leading outside. You hear the new guard coming around the corner…This is your only chance!

nextStage.btnText: Cover the door sign with peanut butter
Threaten the guard with the hacksaw
Use the rope as a lasso to tie up the guard and take his key

stages.stageTitle: You quickly cover the door sign with peanut butter
stages.stageBody: The guard comes around the corner as you roll the empty jar away from you. They ask what you're doing and you explain that the door for inmates to get to the warden's office is jammed. The guard opens the door and you say thanks and walk outside (since it's dark the officer takes a minute to realize their mistake!)

stages.stageTitle: Threaten the guard with the hacksaw
stages.stageBody: The guard sees you before you can even jump out to threaten him, it was a dumb move not hiding properly! He yells for help and you are tackled by the guards who were on break. Ouch you are in the hospital wing with broken ribs and your plans are ruined, Start over

stages.stageTitle: Use the rope as a lasso to tie up the guard and take his key
stages.stageBody: What are you, a cowboy?! Apparently not, it didn't work. You just threw a bunch of rope at the guard who is more confused than scared. Start again
Seriously? This is your only chance and you walk away?! Start again!

Your outside, and you run! You make it to the boat you saw and see that it has the keys in it. YES! You take off and sail to freedom, with the prison officers yelling behind you! You've done it, where to next

You run into a very nice man from Iceland named Sindri Þór Stefánsson and join him for the day, you both take loads of pictures. You two part ways after a day of sightseeing and great food (you've gained a new appreciation for food after the prison slop!). A few days later you see on the news that he was an escaped prisoner from Iceland…You knew there was a reason you liked him!

nextStage.btnText: I don't like it here, lets try somewhere else
I like it here, let me escape this game!

stages.stageBody: You make it to Brazil and find yourself in a tropical paradise. While in a bar one night you're regaling some people in a bar with your escape story and two old men starts laughing. When you ask them what's funny they reveal that they also escaped from an island prison, but they made their own boat out of raincoats and a broken pipe that was releasing steam. The two Anglin brothers seemed nice but you're going to fact-check their story later, it sounds exactly like that copy of popular mechanics you found!

nextStage.btnText: I don't like it here, lets try somewhere else
I like it here, let me escape this game!

stages.stageBody: You decide to take a page out of John Gerard's book and head to Rome, your escape might not have been from the Tower of London but it was just as tough (maybe!). And you weren't imprisoned for being a catholic during the Elizabethan era, or tortured (unless you count the food), BUT STILL, you and he are so similar! Plus who can say no to Italian men food?

nextStage.btnText: I don't like it here, lets try somewhere else
I like it here, let me escape this game!

stages.stageBody: You watched Catch Me If You Can the week you were arrested, and for some reason the idea of escaping to France like Frank Abignal keeps calling you, although you make sure to keep clear of the town of Montrichard where Frank was arrested, your not going to tempt fate that much!

nextStage.btnText: I don't like it here, lets try somewhere else
I like it here, let me escape this game!

stages.stageBody: Thank you for playing! As an extra annoyance, how many real-life and fictional prison escape references did you spot?
You are called by the guard and told you need to pick a job for the day! You really don't want to but maybe you'll be able to get more information or tools for your escape. You have two choices

nextStage.btnText: I've been to both the Laundry & Kitchen

stages.stageBody: You are given laundry duty, and you immediately regret all the years you made your mother do your laundry for you, you've got no clue what you're doing! You look around for any hints, or a manual to tell you what to do but no luck! You shrug and tell yourself if students can figure out laundry then surely you should be able to as well... what could go wrong?

nextStage.btnText: Put everythinng in the washer and press start
Dress up as washerwoman to escape
Give up and take a nap under a pile of clothes

stages.stageTitle: Put everything in the washer and press start
stages.stageBody: Reds and Whites don't go in a washing machine together…guess the prisoners are getting a new colour for their jumpsuits, pink!

stages.stageTitle: Dress up as a washerwoman to escape
stages.stageBody: Well, that might have worked if this was a fairytale or if the prison had washerwomen in it, but unfortunately, real life seems to be very boring and unhelpful right now. Unsurprisingly it didn't work the prison guards saw right through your disguise. Start Again!

stages.stageTitle: Give up and take a nap under a pile of clothes
stages.stageBody: Why is a pile of other inmates' dirty clothes more comfortable than your bed?! Unfortunately, after a lovely hour's nap, the guard comes to check on you and catches you sleeping! Start Again!!

See, this wasn't so hard! You noticed some extra sheets that are torn up and decided to take them while no one is looking. They feel strong enough to make a rope out of it! Just in time, the guard comes in and tells you that you can leave for the night…maybe tomorrow you'll have a better job!

nextStage.btnText: Go back to the jobs board

stages.stageBody: You decide to try your hand at cooking, you can't make it worse than it already is! On your first day, you are told to unpack the supplies while the others prepare the food. The head chef is a very scary man so you quickly head to the boxes of food. There are so many boxes, this might take a while!

nextStage.btnText: Open the box of frozen beef burgers

stages.stageTitle: Open the box of frozen beef burgers
stages.stageBody: You head to the freezer and start stacking the beef burgers on the labelled shelf. Halfway through the box, you see something shiny and when you grab it you see it's a hacksaw! How'd that get there? You grab it, it might be helpful later on!

You open the box and instead of nectarines, you see grenades!! You yell for help and the kitchen staff comes running along with some prison guards. Instead of being concerned, everyone starts laughing at you, and they throw one at you. It is a nectarine, someone just painted it to look like a grenade! You silently curse whoever painted the fruit

Oooh mystery box, you wonder what's inside, could something edible unlike most of the things in this kitchen, something to help you escape, something valuable? You open the box expectantly to find a single jar of marmalade. Well, that was anticlimactic!
You work through the boxes, and after all that work you decide that it might just be easier to escape than to continue working in the kitchen! You go back to your cell

nextStage.btnText: Go back to the jobs board

stages.stageBody: You really need a haircut, not because of prison you had an appointment before you were arrested but life did not go your way! You head to the barbershop in the prison and sit in the chair.

nextStage.btnText: Chat to the man getting his haircut next to you

stages.stageBody: You pick your preferred style and after a while, you look in the mirror. Well it's not horrible, at least your not paying for the cut so you really can't complain

stages.stageTitle: Chat to the man getting his haricut next to you
stages.stageBody: Tommy Lee Royce seems like a nice enough man but he scares you somewhat. He says he is in court the next day so you wish him luck!
Prison, a straight razor in the hands of a fellow inmate, what could go wrong? Actually nothing, he did a really good job if you could tip you would!
You come away with a completely new look, your hair is choppy but the shave was really nice! If you escape, maybe they won't recognize you as quickly!

This is the time you dreaded the most! But it was inevitable, you'd need a shower at some point. You go into the room and hear a weird scraping noise coming from the back of the room behind a curtain. Huh weird.

nextStage.btnText: Nevermind you are not ready for this!

stages.stageBody: You go behind the curtain and see several inmates digging a hole in the floor! It looks quite deep! You ask how long they've been digging for and they said they've been at it for months, a few of them had already managed to escape with the help of one of their mistresses at the end of the tunnel. You ask how the guards haven't noticed the dirt from the tunnel and one of the inmates explained that they have a second tunnel they put the dirt in…something doesn't add up
Have you not learned your lesson about calling the guards over yet?! Start over!
You start having a shower while trying to ignore the noises. It was the most uncomfortable experience you've had to go through, but at least your clean!

stages.stageTitle: Nevermind you are not ready for this!
stages.stageBody: Run away, you'll escape before you have to go back to the showers!
